summary: This document is a declaration of authenticity of AT&T records by Brian Faulkner, a Legal Compliance Analyst at AT&T. Faulkner states that after a thorough search, he found no information responsive to the request made in the context of the Epstein case.

persons.name: Brian Faulkner
persons.context: Brian Faulkner attests to the authenticity of AT&T records and states that no responsive information was found.

locations: 11760 US HWY 1, Suite 300, North Palm Beach, FL 33408
keyFacts: Brian Faulkner is employed by AT&T as a Legal Compliance Analyst.
Faulkner declares under penalty of perjury that the information in the certification is true and correct.
Faulkner was unable to find any information responsive to the request regarding the Epstein case.
